subject: [cc-community] Reminder: CC-Salon London is this Thursday!
body:
Hi all,

Just a friendly reminder that the first London CC-Salon will take  
place this Thursday, at Juno, Shoreditch High Street, London E1, from  
6.30pm until midnight. There'll be music from the after-dinner.net  
DJs, and talks and presentations from Elizabeth Stark  
(freeculture.org), Tom Reynolds (Random Acts of Reality)  and  
Jonathan Roberts (FreeMeDVD).

There's more details at http://ccsalon-london.org.uk, and you can  
sign up on Upcoming at http://upcoming.yahoo.com/event/191066/, or on  
Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=2362493189

Hope to see you there!
Many thanks,

Tim
